verses.1: Amaute, Egypt gam panin a paikhiat zawh uh a kum nihna, a kha nihna a ni masa ni-in, Sinai sehnel gam kikhopna puanbuk sungah Topa in Moses hopihin hih bangin ci hi:
verses.2: “Nang le Aaron in Israel mihonte khempeuh a innkuankuan, a behbehin, pasal peuhmah a milipin a phazah sim un.
verses.3: Israel sungah kum sawm nih panin a tungsiah a pha, galdo dingin a kuan thei ding mi khempeuh a honhonin na sim ding uh hi.
verses.4: A minam simin a beh sungah a lutang ahi mi khat ciat in hong huh ding uh hi.
verses.5: No hong huh dingteʼ min: Reuben sung panin Shedeurʼ tapa Elizur;
verses.6: Simeon sung panin Zurishaddaiʼ tapa Shelumiel;
verses.7: Judah sung panin Amminadabʼ tapa Nahshon;
verses.8: Issakhar sung panin Zuarʼ tapa Nethanel;
verses.9: Zebulun sung panin Helonʼ tapa Eliab;
verses.10: Josef tapate, Efraim sung panin Ammihudʼ tapa Elishama le Manasseh sung panin Pedahzurʼ tapa Gamaliel;
verses.11: Benjamin sung panin Gideoniʼ tapa Abidan;
verses.12: Dan sung panin Ammishaddaiʼ tapa Ahiezer;
verses.13: Asher sung panin Okranʼ tapa Pagiel;
verses.14: Gad sung panin Deuelʼ tapa Eliasaf;
verses.15: Naftali sung panin Enanʼ tapa Ahira ahi hi,” a ci hi.
verses.16: Hihte pen mihon sung panin a kiteel, amauʼ phung sung panin a makaite, Israel behteʼ lutangte ahi uh hi.
verses.17: Topa in Moses a thupiak bangin Moses le Aaron in a min kilo sa hih mite khawmin, a kha nihna a ni masa ni-in amaute in kum sawm nih panin a tungsiah a pha peuhmah a milipin a innkuankuan, a behbehin amau le amau a kiciamteh mihon buppite khawm uh hi. Tua ahih ciangin amah in Sinai sehnel gamah amaute a phazah a sim hi.
